alert.note: Alert for Conway; Johnson; Pope (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 9:17PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of a dusting up to around an inch in the lower elevations of Arkansas River Valley areas. In the higher terrain of these counties...snowfall amounts of 3 to 4 inches are expected. Some locally higher amounts could be seen...especially in the highest terrain. * WHERE...Western and portions of central Arkansas. * WHEN...Rain will transition over to snowfall during the day on Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This snowfall may create some hazardous travel conditions on Saturday.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities...and use caution while driving.
